label: Transport
heading: Andiamo a perth
text: To start the day off, we're gonna drive to perth x

label: Activity one
heading: Escape room
text: Batten down the hatches and all hands on deck. Our first activity is a pirate themed escape room with a difficulty of 4/5.

label: Breakfast
heading: Flora and fauna
text: To break our fast, we will be dining at Flora and Fauna, a woman-owned, vegan cafe. All of the health.
